laboratory_examinations.findings: There were no remarkable laboratory tests, suggesting the absence of rheumatoid arthritis.
The ROM was 10°-110°; HKAa of valgus 16° on the right knee and 16° on the left knee.
The knee ROM was 5°-125°; HKAa of valgus 13° on the right knee and 17° on the left knee.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased ROM from 10°-110° at postoperative day 21 to 5°-125°.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Fixed-knee ROM (10°-125°); HKAa of valgus 11° on the right knee and 16° on the left knee.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: No significant change in ROM compared to the 1-year follow-up; HKAa improved from 13° to 11° on the right knee.

laboratory_examinations.findings: The ROM of the affected knee was 10°-135° with an extension lag of 10°; HKAa of valgus 11° on the right knee and 17° on the left knee.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Improved ROM from 10°-125° at the annual follow-up to 10°-135°.
